select s.student_id,s.student_name,s.student_class_number,s.student_grade, p.p_deyu,p.p_zhiyu,p.p_tiyu,p.p_meiyu,p.p_laoyu,p.p_plan from di_student s right join di_studentplan p on s.student_id=p.p_id
and s.student_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and s.student_id like CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')
order by s.student_id
